br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles

Class ShadowStruggles

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.ShadowStruggles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class ShadowStruggles
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    Represents the application structure, responsible for the change of screens and other general operations related to the game.
